message.content:
cs.CR, cs.IR, cs.SE, cs.CY, cs.HC

This paper discusses privacy guidelines for designing and assessing IoT applications and middleware platforms. The focus is on privacy concerns, which falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR). The guidelines also touch on information retrieval (cs.IR) and human-computer interaction (cs.HC) as they address how to inform and control users' privacy settings. Additionally, the guidelines may be relevant to software engineering (cs.SE) as they provide a framework for designing privacy-aware systems. Finally, the guidelines may also be applicable to cyber-physical systems (cs.CY) as IoT devices often interact with physical environments and collect sensitive data.
